Hidden Japan Tour

Let’s explore Japan with the Tenpos tour!
We will show you the hidden gems that
only locals know especially focus on food.

About us

Our motto is “Enjoy international exchanges",
so we provide sightseeing tours by college students and office
workers from all over Japan.
They are not professionals in the field of tourism yet, but they are
here to help people who want to enjoy their trip to Japan.
We hope that you will also enjoy the services of our tour guides.
